awd_titl_txt: National Collaborative --Scientific Work Experience         Programs for K-12 Teachers
awd_abstract_narration: This proposal requests support for a conference and follow-up                   activities which would begin to network a number of nationally                  distributed programs which place K-12 teachers in scientific work               experiences with federal and state government laboratories,                     universities, and industries.  The activities are designed to                   enable the participants to share information and strategies dealing             with Maximizing the impact of their programs, sustaining the                    programs over time, and program assessment.                                                                                                                     The project is to be co-funded by the Department of Energy and the              National Science Foundation.  DOE is requested to fund the                      conference, NSF is requested to fund the follow-up networking                   activities.
org_div_long_name: Division of Research on Learning in Formal and Informal Settings (DRL)

inst.inst_name: Industry Initiatives for Science & Math Education
